definition: the occupation of a house painter
details:
noun
- the occupation of a house painter
= example: the occupation of a house painter
= synonyms: house painting
- the act of applying paint to a surface
= example: the act of applying paint to a surface
- creating a picture with paints
= example: creating a picture with paints
- graphic art consisting of an artistic composition made by applying paints to a surface
= example: graphic art consisting of an artistic composition made by applying paints to a surface
= synonyms: picture
